name: GANdinsky 3D - Image with Arrow - Variant 01
description: Variant created whole making official video version of Gandinsky 3D art series. Bid on video version at https://opensea.io/assets/0xd2eca00493ea1218a7ad20009ac0a4602839ca2b/1 Contemporary artist Coldie works with Wassily Kandinsky's "Image with Arrow" using Playform GAN AI, aggregating with other Kandinsky art to create modified artwork. New artwork was then converted into 3D by Coldie and animated. Kandinsky is one of my favorite artists of all time and it is an honor to work with his art in a new way using technology not available during his era. The whole time I was creating this art, I made decisions that I believed Wassily would agree with, as if he was sitting with me the whole time collaborating.
collection_description: SuperRare makes it easy to create, sell, and collect rare digital art. SuperRare's smart contract platform allows artists to release limited-edition digital artwork tracked on the blockchain, making the pieces rare, verified, and collectible. Filter the crypto art world's best selling works by artist name, creation type, and year of birth on OpenSea.
